text:
This bug is two fold:

a. XMLSupport should be merged with XMLConstants. In particular, XMLSupport uses
   hard coded values and it should use constants in XMLConstants instead.

b. XMLSupport does not use qualified names in its setXML_zzz methods. I believe 
this is wrong and it should use, for example, xml:space (a qualified name), 
instead of just "space". The "xml" prefix is missing.
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
vincent.hardy@sun.com
text: Merged XMLSupport and XMLConstants. Modified org.apache.batik.dom accordingly.
